Package com.espertech.esper.epl.subquery

Subquery helper classes are found here.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SubqueryStopCallback Implements a stop callback for use with subqueries to clear their indexes when a statement is stopped.
SubselectAggregatorView View handling the insert and remove stream generated by a subselect for application to aggregation state.
SubselectBufferObserver Observer to a buffer that is filled by a subselect view when it posts events, to be added and removed from indexes.
 

Package com.espertech.esper.epl.subquery Description

Subquery helper classes are found here.
